GSP31samkhsuu:3: na dṛṣṭāt tatsiddhiḥ, nivṛtte 'pyanuvṛtti darśanāt | KapSs_1.2 |
GSP31samkhsuu:5: prātyahika kṣutpratīkāravat tatpratīkāra ceṣṭanāt puruṣārthatvaṃ | KapSs_1.3 |
GSP31samkhsuu:7: sarvāsambhavāt, sambhave 'pi sattāsambhavāt heyaḥ pramāṇakuśalaiḥ | KapSs_1.4 |
GSP31samkhsuu:23: na kālayogato vyāpino nityasya sarvasambandhāt | KapSs_1.12 |
GSP31samkhsuu:37: na nityaśuddha buddhamukta svabhāvasya tadyogastadyogāhate | KapSs_1.19 |
GSP31samkhsuu:51: aniyatatve 'pi nāyauktikasya saṃgrahaḥ, anyathā bālonmattādisamatvaṃ | KapSs_1.26 |
GSP31samkhsuu:55: na bāhyābhyantarayoḥ uparajyopañjaka bhāvo 'pi deśavyavadhānāt srughnastha pāṭaliputrasthayoriva | KapSs_1.28 |
GSP31samkhsuu:65: nāsti hi tatra sthira eka ātmā yo garbhādhānādikarmaṇā saṃskriyate | KapSs_1.33 |
GSP31samkhsuu:87: śūnyaṃ tattvaṃ, bhāvo vinaśyati, vastudharmatvāt vināśasya | KapSs_1.44 |
GSP31samkhsuu:164: bhāve tadyogena tatsiddhiḥ, abhāve tadabhāvāt kutastarāṃ tatsiddhiḥ | KapSs_1.80 |
GSP31samkhsuu:176: vijamuktasya bandhadhvaṃsamātraṃ, paraṃ na samānatvaṃ | KapSs_1.86 |
GSP31samkhsuu:183: yat saṃbaddhaṃ sat tadākārollekhi vijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ | KapSs_1.89 |
GSP31samkhsuu:195: muktātmanaḥ praśaṃsā upāsā siddhasya vā | KapSs_1.95 |
GSP31samkhsuu:203: antaḥ karaṇasya tadujjvalitatvāt lohavat adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ | KapSs_1.99 |
GSP31samkhsuu:261: ladhvaidi dharmaiḥ sādharmyaṃ ca guṇānāṃ | KapSs_1.128 |
GSP31samkhsuu:309: evamekatvena parivartamānasya na viruddha dharmādhyāsaḥ | KapSs_1.152 |
GSP31samkhsuu:334: (vastutattvaviparītataya puruṣe kartṛtāyāḥ buddhau jñātṛtāyāśca bhāne hetuḥ), pradhānakārya
GSP31samkhsuu:413: dvayoḥ pradhānaṃ mano lokavat bhṛtyavargeṣu | KapSs_2.40 |
GSP31samkhsuu:442: mātāpitṛjaṃ sthūlaṃ prāyaśaḥ itaranna tathā | KapSs_3.7 |
GSP31samkhsuu:556: viviktabodhāt sṛṣṭinivṛttiḥ pradhānasya sūdavat pāke | KapSs_3.64 |
GSP31samkhsuu:562: anyasṛṣṭyuparāge 'pi na virajya (ma) te prabuddharajjutatvasyevoragaḥ | KapSs_3.67 |
GSP31samkhsuu:576: rūpaiḥ saptabhiḥ ātmānaṃ badhnāti pradhānaṃ kośakāravadvimocayetyekarūpeṇa | KapSs_3.74 |
GSP31samkhsuu:617: bahubhiryoge virodhaḥ rāgādibhiḥ kumārī kaṅkaṇa (śaṅkha) vat | KapSs_4.9 |
GSP31samkhsuu:637: praṇatibrahmacaryopasarpaṇāni kṛtvā siddhiḥ bahukālāt tadvat | KapSs_4.19 |
GSP31samkhsuu:663: na bhūtiyoge 'pi kṛtakṛtyatā upāsyasiddhivat upāsyasiddhivat | KapSs_4.32 |
GSP31samkhsuu:742: na kārye niyamaḥ ubhayathā darśanāt | KapSs_5.39 |
GSP31samkhsuu:748: na yajñādeḥ svarūpato dharmatvaṃ vaiśiṣṭyāt | KapSs_5.42 |
GSP31samkhsuu:802: na vyāpakatvaṃ manasaḥ karaṇatvādindriyatvādvā vāsyādivaccakṣurādivacca | KapSs_5.69 |
GSP31samkhsuu:824: saṃyogāśca vibhāgāntā iti na deśādilābho 'pi | KapSs_5.80 |
GSP31samkhsuu:870: na sthūlamiti niyamaḥ ātivāhikasyāpi vidyāmānatvāt | KapSs_5.103 |
GSP31samkhsuu:874: na tejo 'pasarpaṇāt taijasa cakṣuḥ vṛttitastatsiddheḥ | KapSs_5.105 |
GSP31samkhsuu:878: bhāgaguṇābhyāṃ tatvāntaraṃ vṛttiḥ sambandhārthaṃ sarpatīti | KapSs_5.107 |
GSP31samkhsuu:886: ūṣmajāṇḍajajarāyujodbhijjasāṅkālpika sāṃsiddhikaṃ ceti na niyamaḥ | KapSs_5.111 |
GSP31samkhsuu:888: sarveṣu pṛthivyupādānaṃ asādhāraṇyāt tadvyapadeśaḥ pūrvavat | KapSs_5.112 |
GSP31samkhsuu:900: dvayoriva trayasyāpi dṛṣṭatvāt na tu dvau | KapSs_5.118 |
GSP31samkhsuu:902: vāsanayā na svārthakhyāpanaṃ doṣayoge 'pi na nimittasya pradhānabādhakatvaṃ | KapSs_5.119 |
GSP31samkhsuu:904: ekaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyānirvartakaḥ na tu pratikriyaṃ saṃskārabhedā bahukalpanāprasakteḥ | KapSs_5.120 |
GSP31samkhsuu:922: na bhūtacaitanyaṃ pratyekādṛṣṭeḥ sāṃhatye 'pi ca sāṃhatye 'pi ca | KapSs_5.129 |
GSP31samkhsuu:935: yathā duḥkhāt kleśaḥ puruṣasya, na tathā sukhābhilāṣaḥ | KapSs_6.6 |
GSP31samkhsuu:939: tadapi duḥkhaśabalitamiti duḥkhapakṣe nikṣipante vivecakāḥ | KapSs_6.8 |
GSP31samkhsuu:1025: na śrutivirodho rāgiṇāṃ verāgyāya tatsiddheḥ | KapSs_6.51 |
GSP31samkhsuu:1041: gatiśruteśca vyāpakatve 'pi upādhiyogāt bhogadeśakālalābhaḥ vyomavat | KapSs_6.59 |
GSP31samkhsuu:1065: [i.e., Tattvasamāsa, an abstract of Sāṃkhya philosophy]
GSP31samkhsuu:1094: nāsau punaḥ trividhena duḥkhenābhibhūyate nābhibhīyate | Tats_2.18 |
